n2.speaker: Chi
n2.text: Nice to meet you! I am Chi!

n3.speaker: Chi
n3.text: This narrative script is just a temporary one put into this app so that it can be tested on a different machine.

c1.text: It even supports choices, which formative interviews showed users liked! See?
c1.speaker: Chi

n4.speaker: Chi
n4.text: Other people that I talk to will appear here.

n5.speaker: Chi
n5.text: Anyway. I will send you back to the home screen now. See you later!
